title: gerino
author: gerino
content: According to a survey, almost 95% of new Crypto traders end up losing their money in the crypto market. And there is a simple reason behind this massive failure. Beginners lack the knowledge and experience required to become successful digital asset traders.Fortunately, a new revolutionary P2P Digital Asset Platform Gerino is here to solve this problem. Gerino is designed to provide users with the features and knowledge required to become successful digital asset traders.Gerino P2P Digital Asset PlatformGerino is a smart peer-to-peer (P2P) trading platform that has been tailored with advanced tools and technologies for both beginners and intermediate traders.Gerino understands that trading in cryptocurrencies can be a daunting task for those who are just getting started or lack the necessary knowledge and experience which is why Gerino offers two exciting features that can help you on your journey to becoming an expert trader.Copy Trading: With Gerino, you can choose among hundreds of trading models created by experienced traders. This means that you can directly copy their trades into your own account and start making profits with minimal effort. This feature is especially useful for those who are just getting started and don’t have any prior experience in crypto trading.Crypto Intelligence: To make sure that you stay up to date with the latest news and trends in the crypto world, Gerino provides the largest educational resources made by experienced traders. With this feature, you can brush up on your knowledge and stay updated with all important events in the crypto industry.What is Gerino Crypto Intelligence?Gerino strongly believes in the importance of education when it comes to cryptocurrency. We provide all the resources created by experts to educate our users on the world of cryptocurrency and trading. Our goal is to make sure everyone is up to date with the latest developments in the cryptocurrency industry.Gerino Crypto Intelligence provides a comprehensive set of tools and resources to help users learn the basics of cryptocurrency and trading.Our integrated news feed offers multiple sources of news and information, while our blog posts and articles provide insights from experienced cryptocurrency traders and analysts.Furthermore, our Trade Ideas feature provides users with technical analysis and strategies from professional traders.For those who are new to the cryptocurrency world, our Crypto Academy offers education and tutorials on the A to Z of cryptocurrency and trading. Whether you’re a beginner or a more experienced trader, our comprehensive glossary provides detailed explanations of crypto terminology. We also offer a link library with the most comprehensive collection of cryptocurrency links and resources.For traders and investors looking for a place to discuss the latest market developments and trading ideas, we offer a community platform. Here, users can interact with each other and share their thoughts and opinions on the current market environment.At Gerino, we believe that education is a key component in cryptocurrency trading. With all the resources and tools we have to offer, we hope to empower our users to make more informed decisions and ultimately be successful in their trading ventures.
